seo.title: Car rentals in Lincoln, NE | FriendRenter
seo.metaDescription: Local car rentals in Lincoln — verified people, fair prices, quick pickup near Haymarket and UNL. Friends-first bookings with clear protections.

hero.headline: Car rentals in Lincoln — quick pickup, local prices.
hero.subhead: From Haymarket to SouthPointe, verified cars near you. Add → accept → book.

faq.q: How do bookings work in Lincoln?
faq.a: All requests happen in the FriendRenter app: add the host as a friend → get accepted → confirm your booking → meet at a public spot for pickup.

faq.q: Do I have to be friends to book?
faq.a: Yes. Bookings are friends-only. Add the host as a friend (or request and add at the same time) and wait for acceptance before confirmation.
Public, well-lit spots—often near Haymarket, UNL perimeter, or major shopping areas. Your host will share the exact meeting point in the app.

faq.q: Game day tips near Memorial Stadium?
faq.a: Plan ahead—downtown traffic and parking fill fast. Agree on a garage or lot outside the closure zone and allow extra time for both pickup and return.
Allow time to clear snow/ice, drive cautiously, and take check-in/out photos. If conditions look severe, coordinate pickup timing with your host in the app.

faq.q: Who sets deposits and age requirements?
faq.a: Hosts do. Deposit amounts, minimum age, and any additional requirements are set by the host and shown before you book.

faq.q: Are there mileage limits or extra fees?
faq.a: Hosts choose mileage limits and any extras (e.g., cleaning). You’ll see limits up front; any overages are settled after the trip.
Usually—if the car’s available. Request an extension in the app before your return time so the host can approve.
Return the car at or above the agreed fuel level. Tolls and incidental charges, if any, are reconciled after the trip.

faq.q: Smoking, pets, and other house rules?
faq.a: Hosts set the rules. Check the listing for smoking/pets and any cleaning expectations before you book.
Bookings include clear protections and required photo check-in/out steps. You’ll see coverage details and responsibilities before confirming.

faq.q: What if plans change or I need to cancel?
faq.a: Use the app to modify or cancel. The host’s policy applies; you’ll see timing windows and any fees before you confirm changes.
